titles.title: CB 182 The Law of the Lord is Perfect

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
THE LAW OF THE LORD IS PERFECT,
Converting the soul; the testimony of the Lord is
sure, making wise the simple.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
More to be desired are they than gold, yea, than
much fine gold; sweeter also than honey and the
honeycomb.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The statutes of the Lord are right, rejoicing the
heart; the commandment of the Lord is pure,
enlightening the eyes.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The fear of the Lord is clean, enduring forever; the
judgments of the Lord are true and righteous
altogether.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Chorus Tune:
Moreover by them is Thy servant warned, is Thy
servant warned; and in keeping of them there is
great reward.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Let the words of my mouth, and the meditation of
my heart, be acceptable in Thy sight, O Lord, my
strength and my Redeemer.
